fields.text: Height (cm)

v_min.err: Height must be equal or greater than 100

v_max.err: Height must be equal or less than 200

fields.text: Pre-gestational weight (kg)

v_min.err: Weight must be equal or greater than 30

v_max.err: Weight must be equal or less than 180

fields.text: Current weight (kg)

v_min.err: Weight must be equal or greater than 30

v_max.err: Weight must be equal or less than 180

fields.text:
Pre-pregnancy Body mass index (BMI) = {bmi} based on pre-gestational weight

Woman is {weight_cat}. Weight gain during pregnancy should be {exp_weight_gain} kg.

Average weight gain per week since last contact: {weight_gain} kg

Total weight gain in pregnancy so far: {tot_weight_gain} kg
Gestational diabetes mellitus (GDM) risk counseling
fields.toaster_info_text:
Please provide appropriate counseling for GDM risk mitigation, including:
- Reasserting dietary interventions
- Reasserting physical activity during pregnancy

fields.text: Healthy eating and keeping physically active counseling
fields.toaster_info_text:
A healthy diet contains all 6 food groups which include legumes, carbohydrates, proteins, oils, vegetables and fruits.
A healthy lifestyle includes aerobic physical activity and strength-conditioning exercise aimed at maintaining a good level of fitness throughout pregnancy.

fields.text: Increase daily energy and protein intake counseling
fields.toaster_info_text:
All pregnant women should receive nutritional counseling throughout pregnancy
All pregnant women should have one additional meal every day for proper physical and mental growth of the fetus and to maintain her strength and wellbeing
All health educators should provide guidance on nutrition based on culturally acceptable and locally available food.
fields.toaster_info_title: Increase daily energy and protein intake counseling

fields.text: Balanced energy and protein dietary supplementation counseling
fields.toaster_info_text: Balanced energy and protein dietary supplementation is recommended for pregnant women to reduce the risk of stillbirths and small-for-gestational-age neonates.
fields.toaster_info_title: Balanced energy and protein dietary supplementation counseling

fields.text: Systolic blood pressure (SBP) (mmHg)

v_min.err: SBP must be equal or greater than 20

v_max.err: SBP must be equal or less than 260

fields.text: Diastolic blood pressure (DBP) (mmHg)

v_min.err: DBP must be equal to or greater than 20

v_max.err: DBP must be equal to or less than 260

v_required.err: Reason why SBP and DPB is cannot be done is required

fields.text: Measure BP again after 10-15 minutes rest.
SBP after 10-15 minutes rest

v_min.err: SBP must be equal or greater than 20

v_max.err: SBP must be equal or less than 260

fields.text: DBP after 10-15 minutes rest

v_min.err: DBP must be equal or greater than 20

v_max.err: DBP must be equal or less than 260

fields.text: Do urine dipstick test for protein.

fields.label: Has the woman had pre-eclampsia diagnosis in previous visits?

v_required.err: Please specify any other symptoms or select none
Please enter the result for the dipstick test.

fields.text: Hypertension diagnosis! Provide counseling.
fields.toaster_info_text:
Woman has hypertension - SBP of 140 mmHg or higher and/or DBP of 90 mmHg or higher and no proteinuria.\n\nCounseling:
- Advice to reduce workload and to rest
- Advise on danger signs
- Reassess at the next contact or in 1 week if 8 months pregnant
- If hypertension persists after 1 week or at next contact, refer to hospital or discuss case with the doctor, if available

fields.text: Severe hypertension! Refer urgently to hospital!
fields.toaster_info_text: Woman has severe hypertension. If SBP is 160 mmHg or higher and/or DBP is 110 mmHg or higher, then refer urgently to the hospital for further investigation and management.

fields.text: Symptom(s) of severe pre-eclampsia! Refer urgently to hospital!
fields.toaster_info_text: Woman has hypertension. If she is experiencing a symptom of severe pre-eclampsia, then refer urgently to the hospital for further investigation and management.

fields.text: Severe pre-eclampsia diagnosis! Provide urgent treatment and refer to hospital!
fields.toaster_info_text:
Woman has severe pre-eclampsia - SBP of 160 mmHg or above and/or DBP of 110 mmHg or above and proteinuria 3+ OR woman has SBP of 140 mmHg or above and/or DBP of 90 mmHg or above and proteinuria 2+ with at least one symptom of severe pre-eclampsia.

Procedure:
- Give magnesium sulphate
- Give appropriate anti-hypertensives
- Revise the birth plan
- Refer urgently to hospital!

fields.text: Pre-eclampsia diagnosis! Refer to hospital and revise birth plan.
fields.toaster_info_text:
Woman has pre-eclampsia - SBP of 140 mmHg or above and/or DBP of 90 mmHg or above and proteinuria 2+ and no symptom of severe pre-eclampsia.

Procedure:
- Refer to hospital
- Revise the birth plan
fields.toaster_info_title: Pre-eclampsia diagnosis! Refer to hospital and revise birth plan.

fields.text: Temperature (ºC)

v_min.err: Temperature must be equal to or greater than 35

v_max.err: Temperature must be equal to or less than 42

fields.text: Temperature of 38ºC or above! Measure temperature again.
Second temperature (ºC)
fields.label_info_text: Retake the woman's temperature if the first reading was 38ºC or higher.

v_min.err: Temperature must be equal to or greater than 35

v_max.err: Temperature must be equal to or less than 42

fields.text: Woman has a fever. Provide treatment and refer urgently to hospital!
fields.toaster_info_text:
Procedure:
- Insert an IV line
- Give fluids slowly
- Refer urgently to hospital!

fields.text: Pulse rate (bpm)

v_min.err: Pulse rate must be equal to or greater than 20

v_max.err: Pulse rate must be equal to or less than 200

fields.text: Abnormal pulse rate. Check again after 10 minutes rest.
Second pulse rate (bpm)
fields.label_info_text: Retake the woman's pulse rate if the first reading was lower than 60 or higher than 100.

v_min.err: Pulse rate must be equal to or greater than 20

v_max.err: Pulse rate must be equal to or less than 200

fields.text: Abnormal pulse rate. Refer for further investigation.
fields.toaster_info_text:
Procedure:
- Check for fever, infection, respiratory distress, and arrhythmia
- Refer for further investigation

fields.text: Anaemia diagnosis! Haemoglobin (Hb) test recommended.
fields.toaster_info_text:
Anaemia - Hb level less than 11 in first or third trimester or Hb level less than 10.5 in second trimester.

OR

No Hb test result recorded, but woman has pallor.

fields.text: Woman has respiratory distress. Refer urgently to the hospital!
Oximetry (%)
Woman has low oximetry. Refer urgently to the hospital!
fields.toaster_info_text:
Procedure:
- Give oxygen
- Refer urgently to hospital!

fields.text: Abnormal cardiac exam. Refer urgently to the hospital!
Abnormal breast exam. Refer for further investigation.
Abnormal abdominal exam. Consider high level evaluation or referral.

fields.label: Vulval Inspections
fields.hint: Whether or not the result of the vulval Inspections is normal.

fields.text: Abnormal pelvic exam. Consider high level evaluation, specific syndromic treatment or referral.

fields.label: Cervical exam done?(only applicable if a woman presents labour signs)

fields.text: Cervix is more than 2 cm dilated. Please check for other signs and symptoms of labour (if GA is 37 weeks or later) or pre-term labour and other related complications (if GA is less than 37 weeks).

v_required.err: Please enter the result for the dipstick test.

fields.text: Symphysis-fundal height (SFH) in centimetres (cm)

v_max.err: SFH must be less than or equal to 44

fields.text: The SFH and GA do not match, refer for further investigation.

fields.label: Fetal presentation
fields.label_info_text: If multiple fetuses, indicate the fetal position of the first fetus to be delivered.

fields.text: No. of fetuses
Pre-eclampsia risk counseling
fields.toaster_info_text: The use of aspirin after 12 weeks gestation is recommended as well as calcium if low dietary intake area. Please also provide counseling.

fields.label: Any engagement of the presenting part?

v_required.err: Please specify if fetal heartbeat is present.

fields.text: Fetal heart rate (bpm)

v_required.err: Please specify if fetal heartbeat is present.

v_min.err: Fetal heartbeat must be equal or greater than 80

v_max.err: Fetal heartbeat must be less than or equal to 200

v_required.err: Please specify if fetal heartbeat is present.

fields.text: Fetal heart rate out of normal range (120-160). Please have the woman lay on her left side for 15 minutes and check again.
Second fetal heart rate (bpm)

v_required.err: Please enter result for the second fetal heart rate

fields.text: No fetal heartbeat observed. Refer to hospital.
fields.toaster_info_text:
Procedure:
- Inform the woman that you cannot find the heartbeat and need to refer her to check if there's a problem.
- Refer to hospital.

fields.text: Abnormal fetal heart rate. Refer to hospital.
